item.title: Yosys User's Group
item.description: We have recently started a Yosys User’s Group. You can see the minutes of our first 2 calls here. So far we’ve talked about: What people are using Yosys for, How things can be improved, Introducing our new tools, A demo of our new formal equivalence tool - eqy. If you’d like to join, then please sign up to the newsletter or follow us on: linkedin, mastodon or twitter.
